description:
Our trial lawyers at Friedman & Friedman, PA, are ready to fight for injured persons and survivors in Miami, Florida. We are an A-rated law firm that has built a strong reputation for winning on behalf of our clients.

Our practice areas

We provide A-rated legal services in a wide range of personal injury and wrongful death cases. These are some of the most common ones tackled by our law firm:

  • Product liability
  • Airplane accidents
  • Traumatic brain injuries
  • Truck accidents
  • Insurance bad faith
  • Cruise ship accidents

Our proudest results

Over the years, our law firm has secured multimillion-dollar settlements for our clients. For example, we settled a case at $82 million for a serious car crash that led to the death of a mother and serious brain damage to a child. We also won $30 million for a wrongful death case involving medical malpractice. The insurance company originally offered just $100,000. We cannot promise these results for all our cases, but we aim to get the maximum compensation every time.

At Friedman & Friedman, PA, our attorneys have spent four decades fighting hard for personal injury clients. We are so committed to our clients that we do not charge a penny unless we win your case and you receive a settlement. Se habla espa√±ol.
